description: The French president and his Russian counterpart spoke for more than two hours on Tuesday, discussing the situations in Iran and, notably, Ukraine. On the latter, they only reaffirmed their irreconcilable differences.

headline: US will halt some key weapons shipments of military aid to Ukraine
description: The delivery of munitions and other military aid had been promised under the Biden administration. Missiles for Patriot air defense systems, precision artillery and Hellfire missiles are among the items being held back.

headline: Louis Arnaud, former French hostage held at Iran's Evin prison: 'It's not only a prison that's been reduced to ashes, but the bastion of resistance'
description: By bombing Evin prison, Israel has destroyed a place of terror as well as a beacon of hope, as many dissidents were incarcerated there, writes Louis Arnaud, who was detained there for two years.

headline: School violence in France: Report presents 50 recommendations to break 'culture of silence'
description: Following a major scandal around abuses at a Catholic school, a report by two members of Parliament offers an unprecedented overview and analysis of violence committed by 'adults in positions of authority' against children.

Israel limits entry of baby formula in Gaza as infants die of hunger
description: While waiting to enter Gaza on a medical aid mission, an American doctor watched Israeli security forces confiscate the cans of powdered baby formula packed in his luggage. The vital product is desperately lacking in the Palestinian enclave, where about 50 children have died of hunger since March.

headline: Southern France suffocates under heatwave: 'Every year, it gets worse'

headline: Rekindled love: 'I passionately fall in love with her and then, like a complete coward, I break her heart'
description: They met, fell in love and separated. And then the whirl of life brought them back together. Igor, 61, tells us of his reunion with Gabrielle.
